OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

GiphyApi.label: Giphy API Key
GiphyApi.tooltip: Your Personal API key generated by http://developers.giphy.com

Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: Command to be used for the script. LEAVE ALONE!

Usage.label: Chat Options
Usage.tooltip: Select where you want the command to be used from.

MinCoolDown.label: Min Cooldown (Seconds)
MinCoolDown.tooltip: Minimum cooldown time until giphy can be used.

MaxCoolDown.label: Min Cooldown (Seconds)
MaxCoolDown.tooltip: Maximum cooldown time until giphy can be used.

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

PermissionResp.value: {0} -> only {1} and higher can use this command
PermissionResp.label: Info response
PermissionResp.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have the required permission. 
{0} = user 
{1} = valid wires

GiphyCreatedMsg.value: Giphy was created. It will show shortly.
GiphyCreatedMsg.label: Giphy Created Message
GiphyCreatedMsg.tooltip: Allows the user to know the giphy was created.

GiphyErrorMsg.value: There was an issue with creating the giphy.
GiphyErrorMsg.label: Giphy Error Message
GiphyErrorMsg.tooltip: Shows a message saying there was an issue with creating the giphy.

GiphyCost.label: Giphy Currency Cost
GiphyCost.tooltip: The cost of how much a giphy will cost when created successfully.

OnCoolDown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCoolDown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCoolDown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCoolDown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCoolDown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCoolDown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

InfoResponse.value: To create a giphy use !giphy keyword. At this time the giphy command only accepts one keyword. Future versions will allow a full string of keywords.
InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip: Response when the command is used wrong.

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
